price: Na walikuwamo mjini watu tisa wakifanya ufisadi katika nchi wala hawafanyi la maslaha.
arabic: وَكَانَ فِي ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ تِسۡعَةُ رَهۡطٖ يُفۡسِدُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا يُصۡلِحُونَ
footnotes: Na waongozi wa shari kati yao walikuwa ni tisa, kazi yao ni kufisidi katika nchi kwa maoni yao na madai yao. Wala haukuwa mtindo wao kutenda jema lolote.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wakāna fī al-madīnati tis'ʿatu rahṭin yuf'sidūna fī al-arḍi walā yuṣ'liḥūna
